overview: "Tabu", a film that takes the medium of short film very seriously, tells in 3 refreshing Minutes for which some people may need half their lives: the inadequacy of interpersonal communication, bundled in the dramaturgy of a board game. A at first sight harmless parlor game, the aim of which is to rewrite words as quickly as possible, turns out to be a concentrated family drama in which the unsaid becomes an increasingly large mental cinema. Who is playing with whom, who understands what? A power imbalance placed in the alleged garden idyll of the average family - cards on the table!
title: Tabu
